lines.text: Every day I hate him worse. Today I hate him like it was tomorrow.
What do you want from me?
I want your blood in my mouth.
We simply can not allow the tail to wag the dog any longer.
It's truly amazing how you consistently amuse yourself by annoying others.
Okay, what do you do when you want to escape?
I mean, you see it and you hear it but you don't really experience it. When I experience something, I wanna feel it with all my senses.
Even at the expense of your health?
Listen, I wanna talk to you about something... later. Maybe I could stop by... after practice or something?
Why not? We'll have milk and cookies.

[missing the sarcasm, or ignoring it]
Okay. Great.
Every man has his price, Gary. Yours just happens to be lower than most.
My blood in YOUR mouth? No, I don't think so. I think it's gonna be more like little fuckin' pieces of your brain in my hand.

Now, we've devised a format - a... a bastardized correspondance course, if you will - for those students who have already decided that things will be done their way, and education and society be damned. It's a controlled environment. Uh, students are given all the materials the law requires they receive, and they will do with them what they will.
